sections.title: 1. Payment Terms and Billing
sections.content: Payments shall be made in accordance with the terms set forth in the project contract. Pink Ponk requires a 50% deposit prior to the commencement of any work, with the remaining balance due upon project completion and before final delivery. Failure to adhere to these payment terms may result in:
items: A 5% fee added per week of delay.
Suspension or cancellation of the project until all outstanding payments are received.

sections.title: 2. Warranty and Support Policy
sections.content: We provide complimentary technical support for 30 days following project delivery to address defects or issues attributable to our work. Any support requests beyond this period will be billed as a maintenance service. This warranty is void in the event of:
items: Unauthorized modifications made by third parties.
Failures resulting from external factors, including issues with servers, hosting providers, or third-party software.

sections.title: 3. Dispute Resolution Policy
sections.content: In the event of any dispute arising from or related to these terms, both parties agree to first attempt resolution through mediation. If mediation fails within a reasonable timeframe, the dispute shall be submitted to binding arbitration in accordance with applicable laws, with proceedings held in Monterrey, Nuevo Le√≥n. The arbitration decision shall be final and binding on both parties.

sections.title: 4. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
sections.content: Our website uses cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance user experience and analyze site usage. By continuing to use our site, you consent to the use of cookies in accordance with our cookie policy. You may manage your cookie preferences via your browser settings. For further details, please refer to our <2>Privacy Policy</2>.

sections.title: 5. Cancellation Policy
sections.content: Cancellations must be communicated in writing at least 7 days prior to the scheduled start of work. If work has already commenced, the initial deposit will be retained to cover initial costs, and no refunds will be provided for work already delivered. Cancellations made after work commencement may incur additional charges.

sections.title: 6. Accessibility Statement
sections.content: We are committed to ensuring our website is accessible to everyone, including individuals with disabilities. We continually work to improve accessibility and welcome your feedback. If you encounter any accessibility issues, please contact us at: <1>contacto@pinkponk.lol</1>.

sections.title: 7. Service Updates and Changes
sections.content: Pink Ponk reserves the right to modify its services, pricing, or legal terms at any time. Clients will be notified of any changes via our website at least 30 days in advance. Continued use of our services after such changes constitutes acceptance of the updated terms.

sections.title: 8. Legal Disclaimer
sections.content: Pink Ponk does not guarantee specific outcomes from the use of our services. All information provided is for general informational purposes only. Clients are responsible for implementing our recommendations and maintaining their systems. To the maximum extent permitted by law, Pink Ponk shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use of our services.
